```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```


## Data Import: CSVs

Let's import data using the `readr` package. 

```{r}
litters_df = read.csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv")
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

Look at the data 

```{r}
litters_df

head(litters_df)
tail(litters_df)
```


```{r, eval = FALSE}
view(litters_df)
```


```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```

`read_csv` options ... 
example to get rid of our missing data

```{r, eval = FALSE}
read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv", na = c("", "NA", 999))
```
